title: 2 Bedroom 2 Bath near Palms/Culver City
neighborhood: Los Angeles, Palms, Culver City Adjacent
posting_body: Amazing 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Apartment in the heat of Cheviot Hills, near Palms and Adjacent to Culver City.
This property is a small community with parking and onsite laundry.
The unit consist is approx 850 sq.ft.
with a large open layout, split layout for bedrooms and 2 spacious bathrooms.
Great Natural Light and surrounded by the community pool and lovely palms trees and landscaping off the bedroom areas.
Hardwood Floors, Granite Countertops, Stainless appliances.
Updated light and plumbing fixtures and a part time onsite manager.
Online rent payment and work orders for residents.
3105 S Durango Ave is within 15/20 minutes or 2.5 miles from West Los Angeles College.
It is also near Santa Monica College and The Art Institute of California, Los Angeles.
Available now.
Cheviot Hills is a tranquil and upscale community on the westside of Los Angeles.
With a low population density, mature trees and picturesque streets, the Cheviot Hills area ensures residents are feel somewhat secluded from the hustle and bustle of the busy city around them.
Contact Ernest
show contact info
for a virtual or in person tour.
All move dates should be within 14 days or less
Fico score over 600, ideally 640 to meet certain deposit requirements
Income 2.5 times the monthly rent amount.
Equal Housing Opportunity.
